output.explanation: Adeno- refers to gland, and -pathy means disease. This term describes any disease affecting glands.
Carcin- refers to cancer, and -oma means tumor. This term specifically refers to malignant tumors.
Cardi- refers to the heart, and -ac means pertaining to. This term describes anything related to the heart.
Chemo- refers to chemicals, and -therapy means treatment. This term describes the use of chemical agents to treat disease.
Dermato- refers to skin, and -logy means study of. This term describes the medical specialty dealing with skin conditions.
Gastr- refers to the stomach, and -ic means pertaining to. This term describes anything related to the stomach.
Gyneco- refers to women, and -logy means study of. This term describes the medical specialty dealing with women's health.
Hemato- refers to blood, and -logy means study of. This term describes the medical specialty dealing with blood disorders.
Immuno- refers to immunity, and -logy means study of. This term describes the study of the body's defense system.
Neuro- refers to nerves, and -logy means study of. This term describes the medical specialty dealing with nervous system disorders.
